hero.title: About Numispark
hero.subtitle: Your French digital agency transforming your ideas into tangible success
hero.description1: Are your competitors already a step ahead digitally? Are you looking for a technical partner who truly understands your business challenges?
hero.description2: For the past 3 years, Numispark has supported 60+ French companies in their digital transformation with a 92% satisfaction rate.
hero.description3: We design tailor-made web and mobile solutions that deliver measurable results from the very first weeks.

story.title: Our Story and Founders
story.subtitle: The Numispark Journey (2022-2025)
story.description: Founded in 2022 by Karandeep and Thomas, Numispark was born from a simple observation: French SMBs deserve the same technical expertise as large enterprises, but with a more human approach and adapted pricing.

karan.name: Karandeep
karan.description: Expert in development and digital strategy with prior experience in Parisian startups.

thomas.name: Thomas
thomas.description: Specialist in digital project management, guaranteeing methodology and timelines.

stats.title: A few numbers that define us:

story.location: Based in Caen in the heart of dynamic Normandy, we now operate throughout France with clients from Paris to Marseille.

mission.title: Our Vision and Mission
mission.mission: Democratize digital excellence for every French company, whatever its size.
mission.vision: Become the technical partner of reference for Normandy and French companies that want to succeed in their digital transformation.

samuel.name: Samuel
samuel.description: Technical architect of our complex projects, mastering modern frameworks and scalable architecture.
samuel.quote: Good code is like good architecture: it must be solid, functional, and built to last.

lucas.name: Lucas
lucas.description: Specialist in server infrastructures, databases, security, and performance optimization.
lucas.quote: The invisible part of an application is often the most important. That's where performance and security happen.

metheo.name: Methéo
metheo.description: Expert in modern user interfaces, transforming mockups into fluid and engaging experiences.
metheo.quote: The interface is the meeting point between humans and technology. It has to be intuitive, responsive, and pleasant.

antoine.name: Antoine
antoine.description: Versatile across the entire development chain, with a global vision of complex projects.
antoine.quote: The strength of a full-stack developer lies in understanding an application's complete ecosystem to create coherent solutions.

louis.name: Louis
louis.description: Passionate about mobile technologies, designing native and hybrid iOS/Android applications.
louis.quote: Mobile is no longer optional but essential. Every app must deliver an optimal experience on any device.

charlotte.name: Charlotte
charlotte.description: Creative and methodical, she designs interfaces combining aesthetics and ergonomics with a user-centred approach.
charlotte.quote: Design is not only what you see, it's how it works. Good design is invisible; it blends into the experience.

amelie.name: Amélie
amelie.description: Strategist in natural referencing, boosting online visibility with sustainable SEO strategies.
amelie.quote: SEO is a marathon, not a sprint. It is a long-term effort that builds lasting visibility for your business.

sophia.name: Sophia
sophia.description: Expert in comprehensive digital strategies, orchestrating marketing actions to amplify your projects' impact.
sophia.quote: Effective digital marketing isn't the loudest voice, but the one that speaks best to the right person at the right time.

karan.name: Karandeep
karan.description: Expert in development and digital strategy with prior experience in Parisian startups.

thomas.name: Thomas
thomas.description: Specialist in digital project management, guaranteeing methodology and timelines.

approach.title: Personalised Approach
approach.description: Every company is unique. Our method always starts with an in-depth listening phase to understand your specific challenges before proposing tailored solutions.

tourism.title: Tourism & Leisure
tourism.description: Booking websites, local discovery apps, and tourism matchmaking platforms.

ecommerce.title: E-commerce & Retail
ecommerce.description: Online stores, marketplaces, conversion strategies, and inventory management systems.

education.title: Education & Training
education.description: LMS platforms, digital learning tools, and online education solutions.

b2b.title: B2B Services
b2b.description: Specialized business applications, collaborative intranets, and custom productivity tools.

coaching.title: Coaching & Personal Development
coaching.description: Optimized showcase sites, support tools, and booking platforms.

industry.title: Industry & Craftsmanship
industry.description: Process digitalisation, optimized online presence, and interactive product catalogues.

quality.title: Uncompromising Quality
quality.description: Rigorous development processes with in-depth testing phases. We prefer taking the necessary time rather than compromising on final quality.
quality.quote: Quality is never an accident; it is always the result of intelligent effort.

deadlines.title: Guaranteed On-Time Delivery
deadlines.description: Agile methodology and meticulous planning to deliver within the agreed timelines. Detailed follow-up with regular checkpoints.
deadlines.author: Olivier LENOIR

innovation.title: Continuous Technological Innovation
innovation.description: Ongoing tech watch, regular team training, and adoption of the latest technologies to give you a head start.

partnership.title: Long-Term Partnership
partnership.description: 85% client retention rate. We build long-term relationships and become your trusted technology partner.

transparency.title: Total Transparency
transparency.description: Clear and regular communication, no technical jargon, detailed progress reports, and transparent billing.

education.title: Training and Knowledge Sharing
education.description: Commitment to the educational ecosystem with our training at Rocket School and contribution to developing digital skills.

expertise.title: Proven Technical Expertise
expertise.description: 3 years of experience, 60+ successful projects, and full mastery of the web and mobile development lifecycle.

local.title: Local Approach, National Ambition
local.description: Rooted in Caen (16 Bis Rue Froide, 14000 Caen), we serve clients across France with Norman proximity and Parisian expertise.

humanSize.title: Human-Sized Team, Sharp Expertise
humanSize.description: A team of 10 experts ensuring responsiveness and personalised support while mastering cutting-edge technologies.

roi.title: Measurable ROI
roi.description: 92% client satisfaction, projects designed to generate a positive and lasting impact on your business.

support.title: Long-Term Support
support.description: Maintenance, enhancements, and responsive technical support. We remain your partner after delivery.

privateHonors.name: Private Honors
privateHonors.text: I called on Numispark to develop our Private Honors web application. The development team was very pleasant and perfectly understood our product needs. I'm delighted with the result and now work with them on SEO and marketing.

lydia.name: Lydia DUAN
lydia.text: Numispark wrote several SEO blog articles in Spanish for our client in the travel and tourism sector. The articles are high quality and their writing style is very flexible. Thank you so much for your excellent work, Numispark!

olivier.name: Olivier LENOIR
olivier.text: We have been working almost daily with Numispark for over a year. The team is always very involved and committed to carrying out the assignments entrusted to them. They love being proactive. Always available and pleasant, I highly recommend Numispark!

leo.name: Léo NISHIBAYASHI
leo.text: Numispark was an excellent trainer at our school... Our students really appreciated their contribution!

future.title: Our Vision for the Future
future.subtitle: Goals 2025-2027

territorial.title: Regional Outreach
territorial.description: Become the benchmark digital agency in Normandy while strengthening our national presence.

innovation.title: Technological Innovation
innovation.description: Deepen our expertise in AI, immersive technologies (AR/VR), and IoT solutions to anticipate tomorrow's needs.

education.title: Educational Ecosystem
education.description: Strengthen partnerships with schools and universities to train the digital talents of tomorrow.

impact.title: Responsible Impact
impact.description: Actively contribute to the responsible digital transformation of French companies with eco-designed solutions.

future.ambition: Make Numispark not only an agency of digital excellence, but a true catalyst of innovation and growth for our clients and our Normandy territory.

cta.title: Let's Talk About Your Project
cta.description: Do you have an ambitious digital project? An idea to bring to life quickly? Questions about our services? Our team responds within 24h to discuss your needs and propose concrete solutions.

contact.expertise: Web, Mobile, E-commerce, SEO, Digital Marketing
